sentences.sContent: Figure 4 shows the schematic of this version.
sentences.sContent_eng: Figure 4 shows the schematic of this version.
sentences.sCn: 图 4 显示了这个版本的示意图。

sentences.sContent: The contents of all the elements indicated in the document structure schematic, grouped by element type.
sentences.sContent_eng: The contents of all the elements indicated in the document structure schematic, grouped by element type.
sentences.sCn: 在文档结构示意图中显示的所有元素的内容，按元素类型分组。

sentences.sContent: I was extremely puzzled that there seemed to be no method in the schematic interface to add anything other than a 16-bit accumulator.
sentences.sContent_eng: I was extremely puzzled that there seemed to be no method in the schematic interface to add anything other than a 16-bit accumulator.
sentences.sCn: 示意图界面中除了一个用于添加 16 位累加器的方法外，再没有其他的方法，我对此感到非常迷惑。

remMethod.val: 来自schema(n. 图表； 纲要)

words.tran: [计][心理] 模式；计划；图解；概要
